body:
Hi German!
Yes, that would be very bad. There is no such thing as an uniform sky in
nature.

Maybe John's chapter on sky model is interesting for you:
http://www.iesd.dmu.ac.uk/~jm/doku.php?id=resources:thesis

Cheers, Lars.
